metadata.title: CVE-2023-35853 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In Suricata before 6.0.13, an adversary who controls an external source ofLua rules may be able to execute Lua code. This is addressed in 6.0.13 bydisabling Lua unless allow-rules is true in the security lua configurationsection.

criterions.comment: suricata package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
